Text: Cabral was recognized as a "World Messanger of Peace" and later was a candidate for the Nobel Peace Prize.  Yesterday, July 9th, Cabral was tragically murdered in Guatemala City.  Que nuestro Maestro Cabral descance en paz.
Gracias por la excelente aportaciè´¸n cesarth, en Paz descanse el Maestro Cabral.
gracias por haber estado con nosotros
